verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and spoke <S%G2036><s%> to them again <S%G3825><s%> by parables, <S%G3850><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%>

The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3666><s%> to a certain <S%G444><s%> king, <S%G935><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> a marriage <S%G1062><s%> for his son, <S%G5207><s%>

And sent <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> his servants <S%G1401><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> them that were bidden <S%G2564><s%> to the wedding: <S%G1062><s%> and they would <S%G2309><s%> not come. <S%G2064><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> other <S%G243><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> them which are bidden, <S%G2564><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have prepared <S%G2090><s%> my dinner: <S%G712><s%> my oxen <S%G5022><s%> and my fatted calves <S%G4619><s%> are killed, <S%G2380><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> things are ready: <S%G2092><s%> come <S%G1205><s%> to the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>
But they made <S%G272><s%> light <S%G272><s%> of it, and went <S%G565><s%> their ways, one <S%G3538><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to his farm, <S%G68><s%> another to his merchandise: <S%G1711><s%>
And the remnant <S%G3062><s%> took <S%G2902><s%> his servants, <S%G1401><s%> and entreated <S%G5195><s%> them spitefully, <S%G5195><s%> and slew <S%G615><s%> them.

But when the king <S%G935><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> thereof, he was wroth: <S%G3710><s%> and he sent <S%G3992><s%> forth his armies, <S%G4753><s%> and destroyed <S%G622><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> murderers, <S%G5406><s%> and burned <S%G1714><s%> up their city. <S%G4172><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to his servants, <S%G1401><s%> The wedding <S%G1062><s%> is ready, <S%G2092><s%> but they which were bidden <S%G2564><s%> were not worthy. <S%G514><s%>

Go <S%G4198><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the highways, <S%G1327><s%> <S%G3598><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as you shall find, <S%G2147><s%> bid <S%G2564><s%> to the marriage. <S%G1062><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the highways, <S%G1327><s%> <S%G3598><s%> and gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> as many <S%G3745><s%> as they found, <S%G2147><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> bad <S%G4190><s%> and good: <S%G18><s%> and the wedding <S%G1062><s%> was furnished <S%G4130><s%> with guests. <S%G345><s%>

And when the king <S%G935><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in to see <S%G2300><s%> the guests, <S%G345><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> which had <S%G1746><s%> not on <S%G1746><s%> a wedding <S%G1062><s%> garment: <S%G1742><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Friend, <S%G2083><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> you in here <S%G5602><s%> not having <S%G2192><s%> a wedding <S%G1062><s%> garment? <S%G1742><s%> And he was speechless. <S%G5392><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> to the servants, <S%G1249><s%> Bind <S%G1210><s%> him hand <S%G5495><s%> and foot, <S%G4228><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> him away, <S%G142><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
For many <S%G4183><s%> are called, <S%G2822><s%> but few <S%G3641><s%> are chosen. <S%G1588><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%> how <S%G3704><s%> they might entangle <S%G3802><s%> him in his talk. <S%G3056><s%>

And they sent <S%G649><s%> out to him their disciples <S%G3101><s%> with the Herodians, <S%G2265><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that you are <S%G1488><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> and teach <S%G1321><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth, <S%G225><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> care <S%G3199><s%> you for any <S%G3762><s%> man: <S%G3762><s%> for you regard <S%G991><s%> not the person <S%G4383><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> us therefore, <S%G3767><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you? Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> tribute <S%G2778><s%> to Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> not?
But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived <S%G1097><s%> their wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> tempt <S%G3985><s%> you me, you hypocrites? <S%G5273><s%>
Show <S%G1925><s%> me the tribute <S%G2778><s%> money. <S%G3546><s%> And they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him a penny. <S%G1220><s%>
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Whose <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> and superscription? <S%G1923><s%>

They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Caesar's. <S%G2541><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to them, Render <S%G591><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to Caesar <S%G2541><s%> the things which are Caesar's; <S%G2541><s%> and to God <S%G2316><s%> the things that are God's. <S%G2316><s%>
When they had heard <S%G191><s%> these words, they marveled, <S%G2296><s%> and left <S%G863><s%> him, and went <S%G565><s%> their way.

The same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him the Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that there is no <S%G3361><s%> resurrection, <S%G386><s%> and asked <S%G1905><s%> him,

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> shall marry <S%G1918><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> and raise <S%G450><s%> up seed <S%G4690><s%> to his brother. <S%G80><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there were with us seven <S%G2033><s%> brothers: <S%G80><s%> and the first, <S%G4413><s%> when he had married <S%G1060><s%> a wife, deceased, <S%G5053><s%> and, having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> issue, <S%G4690><s%> left <S%G863><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> to his brother: <S%G80><s%>
Likewise <S%G3668><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and the third, <S%G5154><s%> to the seventh. <S%G2035><s%>
And last <S%G5305><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> died <S%G599><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> in the resurrection <S%G386><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> shall she be of the seven? <S%G2033><s%> for they all <S%G3956><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> her.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You do err, <S%G4105><s%> not knowing <S%G1492><s%> the scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For in the resurrection <S%G386><s%> they neither <S%G3777><s%> marry, <S%G1060><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> are given <S%G1547><s%> in marriage, <S%G1548><s%> but are as the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But as touching <S%G4012><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> to you by God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob? <S%G2384><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not the God <S%G2316><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> but of the living. <S%G2198><s%>
And when the multitude <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> this, they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>
But when the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> that he had put the Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> to silence, <S%G5392><s%> they were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together. <S%G1909><s%>
Then <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, which was a lawyer, <S%G3544><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him a question, tempting <S%G3985><s%> him, and saying, <S%G3004><s%>
Master, <S%G1320><s%> which <S%G4169><s%> is the great <S%G3173><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> in the law? <S%G3551><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind. <S%G1271><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>
And the second <S%G1208><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to it, You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>
On <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> hang <S%G2910><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> and the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
While the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> them,
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> is he? They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, The son of David. <S%G1138><s%>
He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> does David <S%G1138><s%> in spirit <S%G4151><s%> call <S%G2564><s%> him Lord, <S%G2962><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

The LORD <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> you on <S%G1537><s%> my right <S%G1188><s%> hand, till <S%G2193><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> your footstool? <S%G5286><s%> <S%G4228><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> call <S%G2564><s%> him Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> is he his son? <S%G5207><s%>

And no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> him a word, <S%G3056><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man from that day <S%G2250><s%> forth ask <S%G1905><s%> him any <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> questions.
